product_name: FalconGuides Best Easy Day Hikes: Blue Ridge Parkway - 2nd Edition
long_description: Stop the car, stretch your legs! The updated Best Easy Day Hikes: Blue Ridge Parkway offers concise descriptions and detailed maps for 34 easy-to-follow trails along the Blue Ridge Parkway.
